scripts.build: yarn run ts:build && yarn workspaces foreach -pt run build
scripts.reinstall: docker run --rm --interactive --tty --network=host -v "$PWD:$PWD" -w "$PWD" -u "1000" node:16-alpine npx yarn@2 install
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:dependencies && yarn run clean:generated
scripts.clean:generated: rm -rf dist ee/*/dist ee/*/temp packages/*/dist packages/*/temp
scripts.pw:build: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run pw:build
scripts.pw:preview: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run pw:preview
scripts.pw:update: yarn run pw:build && yarn run pw:update-only
scripts.pw:update-only: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run pw:update
scripts.pw:test: yarn run pw:build && yarn run pw:test-only
scripts.pw:test-only: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run pw:test
scripts.pw:debug: yarn run pw:build && yarn run pw:debug-only
scripts.pw:debug-only: cd packages/admin && docker-compose run --rm playwright-tests yarn run pw:debug
scripts.start: docker-compose up --detach && yarn run contember migrations:execute . --yes
scripts.ae:update: yarn run clean:generated && yarn run ts:build && yarn run ae:build
